item.title: Speaker Series (Spring 2021)
item.description: Here is a summary and schedule of the YuQC Speaker Series. Information & Recordings Check out this Youtube playlist of all past talk recordings!! Please click here (yale.edu account required) to access zoom links, meeting passwords, and, eventually, recordings for this speaker series. Prof. Liang Jiang, UChicago The Era of Quantum Information February 23rd, 7PM ET Prof. Liang Jiang joined the faculty of Yale University as an assistant professor in 2012, and later as an associate professor of Applied Physics.
